Key Match Events: India beat Hong Kong by 40 runs to qualify for the Super Fours.
Suryakumar Yadav scored 68* off 26 balls and was named Player of the Match.
Ravindra Jadeja claimed the wicket of Babar Hayat.
Ravindra Jadeja ran out Nizakat Khan off a free-hit.
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav mentioned that some of his shots are predetermined but most of the time, you have to bat in the present.
Suryakumar Yadav shared that the pitch was on the slower side and he wanted to express himself and up the tempo of the innings.
Suryakumar Yadav added that you have to be flexible and ready to play at any position, and he has been doing it for some time now.
